shortDescription: Draw the tile map (or a section of it) on the screen.

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The destination X coords to draw the map at on the screen.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The destination Y coords to draw the map at on the screen.

usages.name: Draw the whole map with scaling and/or different spritesheet
notes: This usage is completely ignored when the map object is set on the spritebatch mode, instead the whole map is drawn with no scaling and/or different sheet!

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The destination X coords to draw the map at on the screen.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The destination Y coords to draw the map at on the screen.

arguments.name: sx
arguments.description: The scale factor of the map's width.

arguments.name: sy
arguments.description: The scale factor of the map's height.

arguments.name: sheet
arguments.description: The sprite sheet to pick the tiles from.

usages.name: Draw a section of the map
notes: This usage is completely ignored when the map object is set on the spritebatch mode, instead the whole map is drawn with no scaling and/or different sheet!

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The destination X coords to draw the map at on the screen.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The destination Y coords to draw the map at on the screen.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The X coords (in tiles) of the top-left corner of the map section.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The Y coords (in tiles) of the top-left corner of the map section.

arguments.name: w
arguments.description: The width (in tiles) of the map section to draw.

arguments.name: h
arguments.description: The height (in tiles) of the map section to draw.

arguments.name: sx
arguments.description: The scale factor of the map's width.

arguments.name: sy
arguments.description: The scale factor of the map's height.

arguments.name: sheet
arguments.description: The sprite sheet to pick the tiles from.
